CustomField.description: If Checked, the Cases will be inserted into Salesforce even if the matching record (Contact/Person Account/Lead) is not found. If Unchecked, the Cases with no mapped record will not be inserted into Salesforce.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If Checked, the Cases will be inserted into Salesforce even if the matching record (Contact/Person Account/Lead) is not found. If Unchecked, the Cases with no mapped record will not be inserted into Salesforce.
CustomField.label: Insert Unmapped Cases in Salesforce
